Dialogue: Sup lil' bro! World's ending soon man, life is crazy.
We're about to disappear like the dinosaurs, man.
Speaking of dinosaurs, I've been hearing sounds like there's some kinda creature nearby.
Might be a t-rex or some shit around here bro. Armageddon.
No chance I'm looking in that pipe, you should also stay away from there too bro.
